ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Great class and provide important foundation for environmental studies.

This is a very practical course for those who want to learn linear regression methods. It is very relevant to environmental science both in the examples and in the assignments. I would definitely recommend this course to someone who wants to learn basic statistics, R, or both, even if they are not environmental scientists! There is a steep learning curve for R, but once you get the hang of it, it's fairly easy and extremely useful for other purposes.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: While not directly relevant to my area of study, it was extremely helpful in learning statistics as well as the R programming language. It will definitely help me design studies and analyze data in the future.
